properties.name: sdlc.pro.spring.tx.board.enable
properties.description: Enable or disable the transaction board feature.

properties.name: sdlc.pro.spring.tx.board.alarming-threshold
properties.description: Duration threshold (in ms) for alarming slow transactions.

properties.name: sdlc.pro.spring.tx.board.storage
properties.description: Storage type for transaction logs. Options: IN_MEMORY, REDIS.

properties.name: sdlc.pro.spring.tx.board.enable-listener-log
properties.description: Enable logging transaction start/end debug messages.

properties.name: sdlc.pro.spring.tx.board.duration-buckets
properties.description: List of duration buckets (in ms) for distribution analysis.
